channel.title: |508-525| Project : Unlimited-Pvp (: Coduesa base
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Unlimited- Pvp[/size] (old Pulsepk) Base is from codeusa!
This is a PK/SPAWN server
READ THIS :
Also im Pretty new in coding 508/525 i never did alot to it
so im not i pro coder etc ..
The reason I want a project is that, I wanted to do a new challenge, I got PulsePk 508 and started working on it, nothing special. I want to make this is a big project, and I want to be succesfull (:
[size=24pt]Pictures :[/size] coming soon
What need to be done:
Adding models:
(what one?)
Dungoneering skillcape whit emote
The New spirit shields from runescape
Torment Demons whit area
New Extreme pots whit overlaods
New Prayers whit effect
New Hp Bar
Dungoneering Armours?
More coming soon ..
What else need to be coded
Clan Channel 100% working
Clan wars whit White portal (safe zone)
Duel area whit 100% staking etc.
Maybe new home area etc
Maybe code all skills (not sure)
Autocast whit maisic autocast.
More summoning npcs
Godwars 100%
add zamorakain special attack whit effects!
&Fix some bugs ofc
In Progress :
